content: Good afternoon, I hereby request a loan.  As we have no collateral to present, we are willing to mortgage a part of our project, it is one of the solutions to make it viable.  Please do not condemn our action or our loan request as we are trying our best. Adonx Exchanger is a CEX, with unique features, the project was architected 1 years ago, and has been developed in the last few months, we are in the final pre-launch phase.  We have faced many challenges, but we are not willing to give up.  Adonx is the platform's token is an ERC-20 with a supply of 21 million tokens. We did an ICO, and an IEO, with low participation in 2021, in which we raised approximately 20ETH, in total we sold about 300k Adonx tokens.  The funds have been used to fund the platform.You can check more about Adonx token here on Bitcointalk thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5320459.0 The proposal then is as follows, we can provide the following conditions as an investment. Amount for deal:  at least 100000USDT in exchange for 500000 Adonx, at 0.20$ rate USDT Address: 0xF0d71c4BA1aE0bd305dCD28f00c8EAC118eaDc71 (our smartcontract address for usdt) *We can use a escrow serviceThe funds will be used for launch marketing, fund the platform in the waiting period. In addition to these advantages, we offer the investment a percentage of our business/volume/fees, 5% to be paid monthly. For more references you can check Platform Progress https://ibb.co/nbS7W5T https://ibb.co/YP61qzP https://ibb.co/NLzVTdJ https://ibb.co/ygmcmDQ Whitepaper: https://docdro.id/SMyKQXZ
